item.title: New position - Head of Studies in MSc Social Data Science
item.description: I will lead the academic development of the news study program in Social Data Science. The program combines state-of-the-art tools from data science with methods from social science. The focus is mainly on quantiative tools, e.g. statistics, machine learning but also introduces useful qualitative methods. Read more about the study and admissions procedure here.

item.title: Are private school subsidies in Denmark too high?
item.description: I have given interviews to Information, DR P1 about the use of private schools in Denmark. I also talked with DR Detektor about the financing of private schools and the consquences of changing the subidies for private schools.

item.title: Reforming admission to Danish high schools
item.description: I was interviewed by the Danish newspaper Information about the possibilities of implementing a new school admissions procedure in Denmark to improve the match quality, see more here. In the interview I argue why the current system is flawed due to its use of priority matching which has been shown to have some design flaws.
